author: Alexama
title: Heaven!
text: We recently stayed at the Mandarin for my niece's birthday. What a treat! From the outstanding service at check-in, the amazing suite overlooking central park AND the Hudson River, the incredible room service and of course, THE SPA!!!! Great location, attached to the Time Warner Center in Columbus Circle (shopping, dining, etc.). In the words of Ferris Bueller, "If you have the means, I highly recommend it!"
